alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:06PM EDT until June 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN ACCOMACK AND NORTHERN NORTHAMPTON COUNTIES... At 806 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Onley to near Exmore to 9 miles northwest of Cheriton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Exmore, Onancock, Onley and Willis Wharf around 810 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Birdsnest, Harborton, Melfa, Jamesville, Silver Beach, Wachapreague, Machipongo, Wardtown, Franktown and Accomac. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
